name: Pet-Rex
description:
T-Rex Virtual Pet is a very entertaining educational game that has a character that you must take care of and take to its maximum potential, but it will not be easy at all, we have 9 mini-games where you will learn in addition to languages, board games with dynamics such as:

-The alphabeth

-Colors and numbers

-Learn geometric figures

-Distinguish shapes

-Build different animals

-Improve your memory, logic and concentration

-vs between friends

-Collect items

-Tombola: They will analyze some colored ballots for a while, with this their concentration on the subject will be maximized.

Everyone can play it and have fun learning!

We invite you to download this incredible game which has potential, since it is free and can be used in any educational or home environment.

Thanks.
